title: How to kill your husband
brief_description: Shirley’s father, a skilled mechanic and excellent drummer, suffered from heart disease. Shirley retells her father’s history, from the struggles of growing up during the depression to his now proud children, grandchildren and great-grandchildren. Made as part of ‘The Heart of the Story’ in association with Vic Health and the Heart Foundation.
